thumb.title: Rose Davidson Talking with the experts May 2025 Online Business Summit guest teacher Richard Blank
thumb.description: Through real-world examples and practical advice, Richard demonstrates how advanced telemarketing and customer service skills are essential for retaining customers and driving success in todays competitive market. Under his leadership, Costa Rica's Call Centre has become a shining example of excellence, thanks to its commitment to empowering employees and delivering outstanding customer experiences.Join Richard Blank s session to learn how to strengthen customer relationships, enhance communication skills, and transform your business operations. His dynamic approach will inspire you to rethink traditional customer service methods and adopt a more empathetic, effective, and results-driven mindset.https://youtu.be/l90PGPybifQhttps://youtu.be/tAxFuKeoeRwhttps://youtu.be/Wm7HwF1WRLYhttps://youtu.be/PdKo7W967eYhttps://youtu.be/-ZihsGctV5chttps://youtu.be/DZYEPpHBBHg?si=XFdn9fn7fqVJJiFShttps://youtu.be/56odkh_YZ3I
